website_summaries.verdict: Tough on the outside, gentle on the inside. Great for warehouse work and other jobs where items are dropped on feet. A fantastic value compared to other steel-toed options.
pros: Gives the benefit of a moderate work boot without the bulkiness
Scuff-resistant leather upper.Synthetic overlays and mesh fabric panels
Durable toe and heel bumper overlay panels
Soft fabric boot lining offers breathable comfort
Relaxed Fit design for a roomy comfortable fit
Gel-infused memory foam cushioned comfort insole

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 pair for my fiancee. For one the first pair fell apart. The second pair is also falling apart. These shoes are very uncomfortable.. usually Sketchers are very comfortable. These are steel toed bought for work. Would never buy again Update. The picture shows them falling apart after wearing for 1 month. No better luck with the second pair either. Terrible product from Sketchers. Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Prison within Feet
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes. They so heavy that you cannot be blown away if you just standing the in the middle of a tornado. If this analogy is too far of your imagination, let just say that you will not be able to walk or run because these shoes have shackled your feet. Gotta love the shoes tho
customer_reviews.author: Gnostic200 M

customer_reviews.title: My go to brand of work shoes
customer_reviews.text: I finally started wearing them this week after several months, old ones gave out. These have memory foam inserts which can be changed out when needed. Light and as comfortable as I found working on concrete floors all day.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have saved my toes from many falling items. I work in a warehouse for UPS, and we deal with big boxes, and clumsy people. When I first started working there, I didn't have steel toed shoes, and I suffered the pain of falling boxes. These fixed that problem pretty quickly. Obviously, they are heavier than normal shoes, but they are comfortable, and easy to maneuver in. My only gripe with them, which is not a con to the shoes and is merely personal, is that they set off metal detectors 100% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: They only gonna last for 3-4 months on 8000 daily business days steps. 🙄🙄
customer_reviews.text: I really do love these pairs because they are so light compared to the keen and timberland. But the problem us that they only last for 3-4 months after that time the memory foam insoles ware out from inside and there will be tear marks on the middle of the shoes. Hate this, gave 2 stars for quality If you found this effort helpful please leave a helpful vote to this.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain DiggerTop Contributor: Travel

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is on his feet over 12 hours a day. He goes through shoes regularly. I decided to purchase these without his knowledge on price. He loves them and has yet to ask for inserts to prolong their life. In my humble little opinion, they are worth every penny. He would have been through two pair of shoes and at least on set of inserts in the time he has already been using this pair. He did notice that they were much better than his other shoes, so I let him know what I did, he is very happy with the price now that he can feel the value.
customer_reviews.author: Custom Metal Finishing-Indiana

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERY comfortable!! Love these work shoes
customer_reviews.text: VERY VERY comfortable!! Love these work shoes, this is my 3rd year buying skechers steel toe work shoes and they are still the most comfortable work shoes I have ever purchased. I am on my feet 8 to 12 hours every work day walking in a warehouse. My feet no longer hurt at the end of the day, from wearing stiff, uncomfortable shoes. Would highly recommend these to everyone looking for an excellent work shoe
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: nice alternative to boots with the memory foam insoles
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and are stylish. They have some weight to them b/c of the steel toe. They are a nice alternative to boots b/c of the memory foam insoles. This is helpful for hard working people who are on their feet continually.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa from Dover, Pa

customer_reviews.title: And so far so good, on my feet for 12-14 hours a day
customer_reviews.text: I went from field work to warehouse work, and wearing tall slide on boots inside didn't make sense for me. A few of the guys were the steel toe shoes I gave it a try. And so far so good, on my feet for 12-14 hours a day. My legs are burning up I can wear short socks now, a lot more comfortable them tall working boots. The memory foam is nice , could be better.only have worn them for three days now.
customer_reviews.author: samul solis

customer_reviews.title: Awfully uncomfortable, dont waste your time!!
customer_reviews.text: If you want strong legs then these shoes are for you! It is pretty much like wearing cinder blocks with foam attached to your feet. They are by far the most uncomfortable work shoes I have ever worn. My feet hurt so bad after the first day(10 hour shift). I thought "let me try it for two more days". Dumbest thing I ever did. I returned them and went back to the Timberland pro brand of work shoes that I've had two sets of. My feet never felt like those at the end of the day. They are big and clunky looking, like shoes my 90 year old grandfather would wear. I would give it 0 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R.

customer_reviews.title: On my feel all day at my job. Great shoe for work.
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet all day every day at my job. I found these shoes VERY comfortable. They fit well immediately out of the box. I have never bought shoes before online without trying them on first, but, I was pleasantly surprised with the successful experience. Love the cushion and feel. I got the steel toes and the shoes were a bit heavier and more bulky than I am used to, but, I was able to adjust quickly and now I LOVE these awesome work shoes and appreciate the added safety benefit of the steel toes.
customer_reviews.author: WkB

customer_reviews.title: Great non slip work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Got these for work, great slip resistant, grips on slick surfaces, not bad for working and walking in snow or greasy environments. Great protection for feet. My only complaint is that the heel has rubber that sticks out and if your not aware of it, you can get your foot caught on things, almost is like a pinch point. Other than that they are great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes... up and down and in and out of his tractor trailer to move freight all day, 6 days a week. His gate to lower freight out of the truck is super rough. It would tear other shoes in just a couple of weeks. So far, it’s been a couple months and they have lasted the longest.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Desrosiers

customer_reviews.title: Nice Steel Toe Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe, the first pair I received they where the wrong ones, they where the half boot type, I sent them back, got the right pair the second time around. A tad hard until break-in. Only had them for 3 days but already I like them, after about 8 hours they make my feet hurt again because they have not been broken in. Great price and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: P. Burt

customer_reviews.title: Woulda been five stars.
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, fit well, sizes run true, very comfortable. One complaint, which is why I gave four stars, is that the laces are hard to pull tight. They run through loops not eyelets and when you pull on the laces only the very top ones tighten and it's difficult to reach down into the lower laces to tighten them. Seems like they sacrificed function for style. I'm going to be interested to see how they last.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Quiet stable shoes to walk in.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes but the inside padding doesn't hold up for very long. I bought the Dr. Sholls heavy-duty support inserts and these make these shoes perfect. If you work outside in the dirt you will be bringing the dirt in with you with these soles. I probably would buy these again when they wear out, just by the inserts with them.
customer_reviews.author: bob ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: These are some heavy duty, and heavy weight-wise, sneakers... Very comfortable and seem quite rugged. These already saved my toes once when I bounced a large piece of shelving laminate off them. I will buy another pair when these get worn down...
customer_reviews.author: A. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: best work shoes ive ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing these shoes for 5 months and they are my favorite pair of work shoes ive ever worn... i work 12 hours shifts at a paper mill and these shoes have held up very well .... i usually buy 150$ boots that last me 3 months before they start to let water seep through but these are still going great... they also have a memory foam like cushion in the sole which make them crazy comfortable ... ill def be getting another pair when these do finally wear out
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Rock

customer_reviews.title: I was 50/50 about buying something like shoes online
customer_reviews.text: First time in my life ordering shoes online. I was 50/50 about buying something like shoes online, but I have other Sketchers I have bought from a store and I knew my size. These steel toe work shoes are heavy, but...hey, they are steel toe shoes and that is expected. High quality and been wearing for three months and no issues. When and if I wear them out, definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: It's like walking on a cloud. I've had them for about a month, and every time I put them on it's like having my own personal cloud. They are a little bit heavy but you get used to it. I will definitely be buying more when it's time. They don't seem to be wearing out as quickly as I expected. I climb on jet aircraft and walk through jet fuel and hydraulic fluid and engine oil and have slipped once.
customer_reviews.author: Aarron L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Quite comfortable. I wore them in the house to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Quite comfortable. I wore them in the house to get used to them. Worn them now for a week at work . I am on concrete all day and they seem to be working okay. They are light on the feet and the memory foam insole in very comfortable. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hubby
customer_reviews.text: My husband has worn steel toe boots for years and his fit and knees show it. We just recently found another way so we started looking around. These look so nice, feel great and he's not limping at the end of the day. He turned a few heads at work, got several questions and now they are looking into getting their own 🙂
customer_reviews.author: April Whaley

customer_reviews.title: Discontinued...get them while you still can...sadly I missed out.
customer_reviews.text: Had them a couple years and another pair before...The memory foam was BS and had to buy extra inserts. I think they got rid of them to jack the price up on the other versions,,,
customer_reviews.author: Daemon

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. They are solid and very well made, with lots of padding inside. After putting my inserts in, the shoes feel like little mattresses for my feet. I work in a metal fab warehouse and generally stand/move about for a solid 9hrs, No painful feet at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Walk on a pillow while you work
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Skechers work shoes. I switched from redwing boots because they are heavy and very uncomfortable. Skechers are light and have memory foam. Like walking on a pillow. Being on my feet all day, this is a huge plus. They meet all the required ratings for electrical and composite toe.
customer_reviews.author: John Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Been three weeks and their comfortable. I wear these five days a week for ten hours a day standing and walking constantly. Durability? If there is a problem I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Kilroy

customer_reviews.title: VERY comfortable and true to size
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable steel toe shoes. They are really heavy but you're going to have that when part of the shoe is steel. I've been wearing to work for 6 months and they are barely showing signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Momma

customer_reviews.title: Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I got them for my husband. Somce he works in hardware I wanted to make sure his feet were protected. Yes they are a bit heavy but that’s normal for steel toe shoes. He’s usually a 11- 11 1/2 on normal shoes so I got a 12 for some extra toe room and it came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for steel toes!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the fact I've worn them for a week and Did not rub the outside of my big toe..not even .. Are probly as comfortable as any steel toed shoe I've worn don't know how durable they are have only been wearing them about a week!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Good but insoles didn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: These are great if you are looking for more of a steel toe shoes instead of a boot. They are comfortable I wear them 10 hours a day 5 days a week. I gave 4 stars because the insoles wore out in a month. I replaced them with Dr scholls and have been great since.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelMcG

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best work shoes I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not take the time to review many things I purchase, but these are worth noting! I have worn steel toe boots,shoes for many years...much safer working in a warehouse/dairy setting. These are by far the best pair I have ever worn...extremely comfortable on my well worn feet and though when they say slip resistant its usually a fib....these are definitely slip proof in my view!
customer_reviews.author: Dave c.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for 4 months for that started to come apart from the sole of the shoe.
customer_reviews.text: They lasted for four months then they started to come apart from the sole of the shoe and water started getting into my socks.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe except....
customer_reviews.text: A little big and clunky. But seriously heavy duty. The only thing that hasn't held up is the insole of the shoe. For some reason it just disintegrates.
customer_reviews.author: BUCKY B

customer_reviews.title: Functional, confortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a replacement for my boyfriends shoes. They're heavy duty but his feet now stay dry when changing car batteries in the rain even when standing in 3 inches of water.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Welsh

customer_reviews.title: excellent work shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best! My husband is on his feet for 10+ hours a day- the memory foam is amazing. The steel toe is exactly what he needs for work, without the bulky boot feel. This is our second pair, I certainly will purchase these again!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fit. Molded perfectly to my feet within a couple of hours wear. Extremely comfortable and very protective. Good looking shoes as well. Only minor downside is they are just a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Took a week to break in but after breaking in period great fit & very comfortable. I work on my feet 10 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Bir

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes my feet don't hurt at all post shift I always recommend skechers work shoes
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Fit the Bill!
customer_reviews.text: As an outdoor deck contractor I was looking for a pair of construction shoes that were lightweight, comfortable, had toe protection, were puncture resistant and of course looked good. It wasn't easy, but these are just what I was looking for. These babies are very comfortable, even for my wide foot. They seem to be well constructed but time will tell if these shoes will last. I've had Sketchers casual shoes before and they were well made and lasted, so I'm hopeful these will be just as durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, comfortable, light weight and looks great. That front toe section is a little too turned up though, not flat on the ground. Guess its because of the steel.
customer_reviews.author: Puddy

customer_reviews.title: Great steel toe shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great steel toe shoes. The only issue I had (which isn't really an issue with the shoe) is they are a little taller than regular Skechers tennis shoes in the back. I normally wear no show socks, so the first day I wore them the back of the shoe rubbed the back of my foot. From now on I'll just wear taller socks. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very durable- great value
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these shoes. I bought them to use while working in the garden and in my garage. I am on my knees a lot and the toes have held up well. Very durable shoes, will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Fields

customer_reviews.title: It's all you can ask for
customer_reviews.text: it's great! it's all you can ask for in a work shoe. very solid and feels strong with a comfortable fit and memory foam and steel toe, I would say it scores a minimum of 95%. the reason I say that and not 100 is because the steel toe has a little bump in the front of the shoe when you are wearing it, but it's really great.
customer_reviews.author: since1492

customer_reviews.title: Updated review. Bought in May and now it’s October been just over 5 months
customer_reviews.text: As described. Second pair I have owned in two years. I put them through it. These seem better then the first pair I owned. The first pair started to seperate at the sole but these haven’t. Update I’m at 5 months and they have now started to separate from the sole of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Worthy to safe your fingers
customer_reviews.text: This is confortable and keep my feet warm and safe,excellent material for the price but it kind of heavy to carry them all day, Otherwise are great.
customer_reviews.author: PERLA GRIJALVA

customer_reviews.title: Super poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: They are horrible. Broken in a month. Now they almost apart. I asked return and they said the return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna

customer_reviews.title: Got what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Got what I expected. The only complaint, was the "memory foam" insert, which has shifted to one side (it's glued to the inside of the shoe, or something like that)... but it is comfortable, being on my feet 8-10 hours/day.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: verry durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son he says they are the best work shoes he has ever had his feet do not hurt and his back is better
customer_reviews.author: harolds2

customer_reviews.title: Best steel toe shoes I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I'm required to wear steel toe shoes for work and most are heavy and hurt my toes. Once I broke these in I find they are light and easy on the toes. Plus they look great. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: K Hill

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. He has terrible foot problems. This is his 3rd pair they hold up great. Hope they never stop making them
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, sold and durable
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 9.5 in most shoes, when I received these, they had an extra .5 inch towards the toe. Otherwise the shoes work great. The memory foam helps out for the most part. But you will need inserts after a bit. All in all...i would say 7.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Huggiebear22

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here, great work shoe vs heavy boots
customer_reviews.text: Breathable, good fit, and comfortable, all I needed and they delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear these every day and they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are good working shoes, a little on a heavy side, but all steel toes are.
customer_reviews.author: Sensei

customer_reviews.title: He's happy with the sketcher shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these shoes for work. They are a little large on him. He had an almost identical pair prior in an 8 1/2w and they were perfect. I wish these came in half sizes. Other than that, he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight steel toed shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes feel light weight and not heavy that steel toe shoes has a reputation for.
customer_reviews.author: lilo

customer_reviews.title: i am a fan of sketcher work boots but their work shoes kinda suck.
customer_reviews.text: they are alright for short periods of time but they are uncomfortable a few hours in and the tongue moves around alot. i am a fan of sketcher work boots but their work shoes kinda suck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... pair of work boots were killing my feet after like 3 weeks to the point of a blister that ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a diabetic and my last pair of work boots were killing my feet after like 3 weeks to the point of a blister that would not seem to heal at all but after like 3 days of wearing these the blister is healed and these thing feel like I'm walking on clouds compared to my last pair I love them, even picked up a pair of skechers regular sneaker for after work.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: They are that comfortable. Fellas
customer_reviews.text: These shoes literally made me cream to the brim. They are that comfortable. Fellas, grab a pair and blow your nuts because there is no going back after this.
customer_reviews.author: Scary Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. Unfortunately after a month the shoe starting coming apart from the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality especially for price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for working in a manufacturing environment. They have great support and feel. The only reason I gave them a 4 instead of five is because since they are memory foam soles your feet can get quite sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: levi

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfort of sketchers , even more at work, with steel toes and walking on concrete all day, my feet love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super Soft and comfortable, great for people who need to be on their feet all day
customer_reviews.author: anne sueTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but heavy
customer_reviews.text: Shoe seemed well made but ran large both in width and length. Weight of the shoe was also a problem - rather heavy. Had to return the shoes, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Work Boots
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these boots for my husband. He needed steel toed shoes for his job. He loves them. He said they are very comfortable. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robin AF

customer_reviews.title: Great steel toe shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just what the doctor ordered! Style, size, comfort and price is well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Busy

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and looks
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and looks. Rubber on the front is wearing off fast, fraying in numerous places. tread seams to be holding up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Keeran-Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband who loads trucks in a warehouse. He says they are very comfortable, plenty of toe room, feels like a slightly heavier tennis shoe. He works 10 hour days without sore feet or knees.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relieved my husband's foot pain. He stands on concrete ...
customer_reviews.text: Relieved my husband's foot pain. He stands on concrete for 10-12 hours a day. The only shoe he will buy now
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J. Shipman

customer_reviews.title: These are super comfortable, and fit my awkwardly wide feet very ...
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable, and fit my awkwardly wide feet very well. I've only had them for a week, so I can't speak to durability yet, but so far they are way better than the Brahmas I got from Walmart for $15 more.
customer_reviews.author: Criostoir Searlas

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Very happy initially... Very comfortable due to the memory foam but roughly 2 months later the foam started pitting (small holes formed) inside making it uncomfortable... Very disappointed that this happened after only 2 months
customer_reviews.author: NteRydr80

customer_reviews.title: Outside is durable but don't get them wet.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't even really got them wet, just basic mopping at work and after a month or two the inside is peeling up...
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last three months
customer_reviews.text: Bought in July and soles are already falling off. Comfortable, but not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda becker

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable steel toe shoe I've worn
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable steel toe shoe I've worn. The memory gel supports the feet well and it's not as heavy as most steel toe boots. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Luecke

customer_reviews.title: Safety and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are for work. My husband says they are comfortable and safe for his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Yclayton

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. He's on his feet all day and the memory foam insoles are wonderful. He said they're the most comfortable shoes he's had in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: T. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable and fit good
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for a quick transaction. They are very comfortable and fit good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Spitzer

customer_reviews.title: Comfotsble work shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe for work, a little heavy but very comfortable and easy to stand on your feet for long periods in these shoes. I would recommend these shoes
customer_reviews.author: kmc

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair my son wanted to order. Very comfortable so wanted another pair.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA JEFFERS

customer_reviews.title: I have nothing bad to say about these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about these shoes. They feel great and way better then any work boot Wal Mart has to offer at their stores.
customer_reviews.author: robert mandus

customer_reviews.title: So far they seem like their going to last awhile
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bartender, and I do landscapeing. I wear them every day. Not once have I slipped. I have had them for about a week. At first my feet here but now my feet are used to them. So far they seem like their going to last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle cole

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Feels great 👍! Steel toe and you don’t even know it ! Anti slip works great ..
customer_reviews.author: Nick C

customer_reviews.title: Fit was perfect and he had no break-in time
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was ordered for my Grandson, Fit was perfect and he had no break-in time, said was very comfortable from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice shoes I will buy them again when these wareout
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son has really enjoyed wearing these shoes. They are comfy and have held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Thompson Hornbaker

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is ok
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is heavy and very stiff. I could use it when i move a lot of furniture but when i have to walk a lot i can't use this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, very comfortable, especially for a steel toed shoe...
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes (sneakers) for work in heavy industry. Perfect for the job, slip-resistant and excellent toe protection. Very pleased with the product and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Put your own insoles in
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems very good for price. You will need your own insoles though. It comes with a foam insole that just collapses under your weight and gives no cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Cobbweb422

customer_reviews.title: They memory foam is real comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are the best steel toe shoes I have ever bought. They are real comfortable and a real good price.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe and perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: My husband says these fit perfectly and are very comfortable. He is on his feet all day and said his feet aren't dore when he getd home now.
customer_reviews.author: Evale Wehling

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Work Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable work shoe especially if you are on your feet the entire shift. Highly recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Rutkowski

customer_reviews.title: Good (For Sketchers)
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable and breathable. I'm just not an overall fan of Sketchers. But, the price and other reviews made me decide on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Herman

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, long lasting cushion
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a while now, and I love them! Very comfortable, and out lasting my last pair that were made by another popular brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Leave it to sketches to also have a great steel toe too
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have the comfort and ease of on and off all with a steel toe. Leave it to sketches to also have a great steel toe too. Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kirkwood

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not that durable.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable breathable work shoe out there, but it only lasts 6 months before the sole separates from the rest of the shoe. But it is definitely worth the price for the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe otherwise
customer_reviews.text: There is a padded lip on the inside of the shoe which rubbed against my son's feet and made him uncomfortable so we returned them. He felt they would rub blisters on the instep of his foot. Great shoe otherwise, we are disappointed that it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Mattox

customer_reviews.title: Quality / Durability / Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Quality and durability meet in this work shoe. Comfortable and fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Shoes do not fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for work but shoes were too narrow and steel toe rubbed my toe. Shoes were not true to size. I would like to trade for a half size bigger or wide width if possible or a full refund. Thank yuo.
customer_reviews.author: Eleazar Rios

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes for ruggedness and grip. Heavy but that's to be expected. Certainly not for long distance walking LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard D. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoes
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and nice looking for steel toe, will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Gladfam

product_meta.title: Skechers for Work Men's Holdredge Steel Toe Work Shoe
